column1: Not exactly clear where gauge was. Obs lived at 32 East St, but had offices at 29
Censuses suggest house was near Station Road. East St around this part is fairly flat at correct alt
1903 Jan value removed as gauge moved in Feb – value was 6.26
1922 – new obs – gauge might have done small move – offices were at 29, but can't find where he lived
1922 Note says imperfect. Not clear why
